verbose_text: To date, one of the most extensively tested markers in human cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) is DJ-1 XREF_BIBR, in which mutation causes autosomal recessive PD XREF_BIBR and is also believed to be important in idiopathic PD particularly due to its antioxidative activity and associated neuroprotection XREF_BIBR.
evidence: DJ-1 XREF_BIBR , in which mutation causes autosomal recessive PD
